programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson investigates a police officer's accusations of sexual assault; Capt. Tucker's retirement party ends in tragedy.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Kat steps over the line when she suspects a trainer at her boxing gym is taking advantage of his students.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins tries to root out a government worker who is withholding green cards in exchange for sex.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An ingénue ballerina discovers she's been secretly videotaped for a pornographic website.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Chief Garland must put friendship aside when a pastor at his church is arrested.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU must unravel the mystery of a sexually assaulted young homeless woman who has a dual personality; when she goes missing after being assaulted, the team is challenged to uncover not only her identity but also her whereabouts.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a waitress at a popular restaurant is sexually assaulted, SVU looks for the culprit at the top of the culinary food chain, but Benson and Stone hit a wall when it's time to prosecute.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stone asks Benson to investigate a sexual encounter from his past that he feels guilt and uncertainty about; Rollins considers a proposal from Doctor Al.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Investigation into a deadly house fire.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Investigation into a deadly house fire.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The NCIS team travels to Cuba for an unsanctioned mission after Callen gets a lead on Anna Kolcheck's whereabouts.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen and Sam travel to the USS Allegiance in the Persian Gulf to work with Navy Capt. Harmon "Harm" Rabb Jr. when the team learns about ISIS sympathizers who are targeting military locations.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen and Sam work to locate a group of ISIS sympathizers aboard the USS Allegiance; Hetty enlists her friend to help obtain information from a Russian diplomat.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler team with detectives Briscoe and Green to investigate the gunshot murder of a man believed to be a sexual aggressor.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives face off against a Colombian cartel and the Drug Enforcement Administration while investigating the brutal rape and murder of an undercover agent.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A standoff in a motel on the Jersey Shore incites a pedophile to take detective Benson hostage.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After recovering from being shot during a robbery, Fin returns to the narcotics division to keep a promise he made to locate a missing person.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Stabler and CSU technician Millie Vizcarrondo (Paula Garcés) investigate a child's remains found at a construction site and find they belong to one of five boys reported missing 30 years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When detective Benson gets into the middle of an investigation of her brother, the case begins to threaten her career.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Sgt. Voight and Detectives Lindsay and Halstead work with Sgt. Benson and the SVU as they investigate the roots of a child pornography site; tension between Benson and Voight threaten the investigation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Fin revisits his military roots to help a fellow Army Ranger who is struggling to recover from a sexual assault.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi tries Richard Wheatley for the murder of Kathy Stabler; Benson finds herself at odds with a friend when Barba agrees to take the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU is called in to help investigate a wave of hate crimes on Christmas Eve; Rollins catches up with an old flame.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A girl is shot and Cosgrove teams with Detective Jalen Shaw to track down her killer; Benson and Stabler assist and realize it's more than a typical homicide; McCoy and Price seek justice against an international crime ring; part 2 of 3.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A group of teens terrorizing tourists has the SVU squad working overtime; McGrath teams them up with the Bronx gang unit to track down a crucial lead.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Carisi are baffled when a series of assaults have the same M.O. but different DNA at each crime scene; Muncy believes Elias Olsen has struck again and is determined to prove it.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: In the search for a revenge-for-hire crime ring, Benson and Stabler combine forces on a case that has now spread globally; Fin and Bruno help a victim assaulted a second time; Jet's plan to hack the dark web backfires and puts the team in danger.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: When Sarah reveals a detail about the case, Rudy must choose between his client and girlfriend.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi's niece helps a friend report a sexual assault; Benson investigates a college's secret society that preys on female students.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Agent Sykes struggles to cope on the anniversary of her sister's disappearance; Benson suspects a cold case from Manhattan could help her get closure.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler team with detectives Briscoe and Green to investigate the gunshot murder of a man believed to be a sexual aggressor.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After recovering from being shot during a robbery, Fin returns to the narcotics division to keep a promise he made to locate a missing person.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: Edwin van der Sar has faced down pressure on the biggest stages in world football, but his toughest battle came after retirement. programme.title: Tri-Series International T20 Cricket
programme.desc: South Africa and Zimbabwe meet in the fourth contest of this T20 Tri-Series at Harare Sports Club. The Proteas beat Zimbabwe by five wickets in the series opener.

programme.title: Tri-Series International T20 Cricket
